title: Deazy acquires Geektastic to flaunt talented developers
description:
Bristol-based Deazy – a tech startup connecting enterprises with global development talent – has acquired Geektastic, a provider of customisable, expert-reviewed technical skills assessments. The acquisition allows Deazy to demonstrate the quality of its developer community to potential clients. Founded in 2019, Deazy partners with companies like the RAC and Popeyes to help accelerate their... Read more »

The post Deazy acquires Geektastic to flaunt talented developers appeared first on Developer Tech News.
